items.title: Rainy Drive
items.description: Waiting outside in the parking lot, reading a book while the wind blows.

items.title: Gulf Thunder
items.description: A storm in the Gulf sets the sky asunder.

items.title: Hyperspace Passage
items.description: The trip to Ganymede will be uneventful.  Sleep is encouraged.

items.title: Rainy Moor
items.description: When the clouds let loose, the moors comes awake.

items.title: Saturnalic Rings
items.description: Docks are full.  Take us around the planet a few times.

items.title: The Edge
items.description: Time slows beyond this sector.  You could linger forever.
